price: 177 lorsque Chou’ayb leur dit : « Ne craignez-vous pas le Seigneur ?
arabic: إِذۡ قَالَ لَهُمۡ شُعَيۡبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: idh qāla lahum shuʿaybun alā tattaqūna
